insights.title: 8 FinTech trends & insights that are shaping the future of the industry
insights.description: Working in venture capital offers insights into the problems, challenges, and new markets today’s entrepreneurs are addressing at the very earliest opportunity, a window on disruption and innovation. Business models are being redefined at an ever-quickening pace, and this is particularly visible in FinTech. We recently sat down with the founders of all of our FinTech investments with the following key learnings and insights.

insights.title: The Roaring 2020’s: How the SaaS industry is set to explode
insights.description: The SaaS industry is set explode with founders who are experimenting with new business models, technologies & attempting to solve the world’s greatest problems

insights.title: DAOs and Web3 Governance: The Promise, Implications and Challenges Ahead
insights.description: The past two years in crypto have been absolutely astounding. From “DeFi summer” (now $250bn+ of total value locked) to “NFT craze” ($3.4bn monthly GMV on Opensea  alone in August 2021) to Solana’s epic rise and various memecoin’s ultimate downfalls – the sheer pace of adoption and activity across the crypto ecosystem has been an incredible force.
